ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.
a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.
a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.
a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.

name: libgcrypt-split

about.summary: a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.
a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.12.1" %}

package:
  name: libgcrypt-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/libgcrypt/libgcrypt-{{ version }}.tar.bz2
  sha256: 7df5c08d952ba33f9b6bdabdb06a61a78b2cf62d2122c2d1d03a91a79832aa3c

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - autoconf 2.71
    - automake
    - make
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}
  host:
    - libgpg-error

outputs:
  - name: libgcrypt
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib') }}

    requirements:
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib', exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-tools', exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-devel', exact=true) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib', exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-tools', exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-devel', exact=true) }}

    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/bin/dumpsexp
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/bin/hmac256
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/bin/mpicalc
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/gcrypt.h
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libgcrypt.20${SHLIB_EXT}  # [osx]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libgcrypt${SHLIB_EXT}.20  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig/libgcrypt.pc
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/aclocal/libgcrypt.m4
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/info/gcrypt.info
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/info/gcrypt.info-1
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/info/gcrypt.info-2

    about:
      license: LGPL-2.1-or-later AND GPL-2.0-or-later

  - name: libgcrypt-tools
    script: install-libgcrypt-tools.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - make
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-devel', exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib', exact=true) }}
        - libgpg-error
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib', exact=true) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/bin/dumpsexp
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/bin/hmac256
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/bin/mpicalc
    about:
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - LICENSES

  - name: libgcrypt-lib
    script: install-libgcrypt-lib.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib') }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      host:
        - libgpg-error
    test:
      commands:
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/bin/dumpsexp
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/bin/hmac256
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/bin/mpicalc
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libgcrypt.20${SHLIB_EXT}  # [osx]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libgcrypt${SHLIB_EXT}.20  # [linux]
    about:
      license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
      license_file:
        - COPYING.LIB
        - LICENSES

  - name: libgcrypt-devel
    script: install-libgcrypt-devel.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib') }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - make
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib', exact=true) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('libgcrypt-lib', exact=true) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/bin/dumpsexp
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/bin/hmac256
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/bin/mpicalc
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/gcrypt.h
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libgcrypt.20${SHLIB_EXT}  # [osx]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libgcrypt${SHLIB_EXT}.20  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig/libgcrypt.pc
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/aclocal/libgcrypt.m4
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/info/gcrypt.info
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/info/gcrypt.info-1
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/share/info/gcrypt.info-2
    about:
      license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
      license_file:
        - COPYING.LIB
        - LICENSES

about:
  home: https://gnupg.org/software/index.html
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later AND GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file:
    - COPYING.LIB
    - COPYING
    - LICENSES
  license_family: GPL
  dev_url: https://dev.gnupg.org/source/libgcrypt/
  summary: a general purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - martindurant
    - mariusvniekerk
    - mbargull
    - xhochy
